item.description:
Two international artists, Yesenia Fernandez Selier and Ella Mesma, will be in Cambridge this Sunday, April 18!

Join us for a great afternoon of Afro-Cuban and Brazilian dance. Whether you love Salsa, Samba or African Dance, this is a day you don't want to miss!

--Move your body more naturally, sensually and musically with Ella & Yesenia's dance secrets & special exercises to practice at home
--Dance traditional Samba, Rumba and Congo styles with renowned experts
--Experienced dancers will learn exciting new moves and choreography
--At the end of the day, instructors, students and friends will come together to socialize, social dance and experience the amazing connections between the dances & music of these two beautiful cultures. ALL ARE WELCOME!

***Pay online by April 17 and save!***
http://metamovements....


SCHEDULE

3-4pm: Body Movement for Afro-Cuban & Brazilian Dance (Open Level)

4-5pm: Samba Technique Basics (Beginner-Intermediate) OR
4-5pm: Congo Dances from Cuba (Open Level)

5-6pm: Samba Choreography (Intermediate-Advanced) OR
5-6pm: Afro-Cuban Rumba (Open Level)

6-7:30pm Afro-Cuban & Brazilian Dance Encounter
Performances, Student Demos, Historical Presentation, Brazilian Food, and more!


Payment & Registration

You can either pay online or to any MetaMovements staff member at any MetaMovements class or event.


Take one workshop:--------$25.00(At the door) $20.50(Online, goes up daily)
Take any two workshops : $45.00---------------- $36.90
Take any three workshop: $60.00---------------- $49.20
Afro-Cuban & Brazilian Dance Encounter:$10.00 (Pay at the door)

We can get a 10% discount for meet up members, please contact me so that we can set up a special list. If we can make a single payment for our group of 8 or more, we can get a 20% discount. Let me know before you purchase tickets.


I'll be there half an hour early and will be wearing my grey fedora hat. You can't miss me..


For more info, please visit:
http://metamovements....

Or email:
metamovementsdance@gmail.com

group.name: The Boston & Cambridge Salsa Meetup Group

item.name: Afro-Cuban & Samba Dance Workshops this Sunday!!!!!!!
